p: Before Thomas H. Cann, Justice of the Peace in and for Seattle Precinct.

James F Woolery being first duly sworn, says taht at Seattle in said County, on the 10 day of November 1882 one believe have unknown Chin Chung did commit the crime of smoking visiting a house whose as follows. opium kept for the purpose of opium smoking and having in his possession pipe & appliances for opium smoking and did visit such house or place for the purpose of smoking or inhaling opium contrary to the form of the statute in such case made and provided, and against the peace and dignity of the Territory of Washington.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this, the 11 day of November 1882
Justice of the Peace, Seattle Precinct.
